userName.title: Username
userName.description: The UPN (UserName) used to sign-in to Skype for Business.

sipAddress.title: SIP Address
sipAddress.description: The SIP address (Email) used to sign-in to Skype for Business.

userNameInAdvancedOnly.title: User Name field location
userNameInAdvancedOnly.description: Specify where the User Name field is displayed during sign-in.

autoAcceptTimeout.title: Auto Accept Timeout
autoAcceptTimeout.description: Auto-Accept timeout for users without Server-side Conversation History.

warnWhenUnknownLocationForE911.title: Warn Unknown Location for Emergency 911
warnWhenUnknownLocationForE911.description: Warns the user when dialing an emergency number from an unknown location.

autoDetectAutoDicoveryURLs.title: Server Discovery Method
autoDetectAutoDicoveryURLs.description: Specify how Skype for Business identifies the transport and server to use during sign-in. (The misspelling of Discovery in the key is intentional.)

trustedDomainList.title: Trusted Domain List
trustedDomainList.description: List of trusted domains for HTTP redirects.
